document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2013-07
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY O F AMERICAN CANYON RECOMMENDING CITY COUNCIL APPROVAL OF THE COTTAGE FOOD ORDINANCE CONSISTING OF AMENDING MUNICIPAL CODE SECTION 19.04.030 ADDING A NEW SUBSECTION 19.10.040 OF THE AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE RELATING TO COTTAGE FOOD OPERATIONS
